description:
CONTROLS
WASD - Movement
Space - Roll
Left Click (Hold) - Charge Attack

ColorHex

Cheating against a witch is certainly not a good idea. Instead of rolling dice, you're the one who gets rolled!

ColorHex is a top-down action game in which you play as a die. Roll to change your face and change your color, allowing you to hit different enemies!

Hitting enemies with faces in ascending order (1, 2, 3, etc.) nets you a COMBO, healing all of your health!
